messages: e29be37c2febc43a0d21a1f8efa351af (22:32): heycam|away: ping
e29be37c2febc43a0d21a1f8efa351af (22:32): anne: ping
e29be37c2febc43a0d21a1f8efa351af (22:33): i'm about to post something to the geoloc wg list
e29be37c2febc43a0d21a1f8efa351af (22:33): if you two could comment or something at some point, that'd be nice
f5af272b5b04154c260eec46f4deb905 (22:42): e29be37c2febc43a0d21a1f8efa351af - has geoloc v2 been fixed to not fork so drastically from the vCard4 location/address schema?
e29be37c2febc43a0d21a1f8efa351af (22:42): f5af272b5b04154c260eec46f4deb905: um, i'm not reviewing that spec today
e29be37c2febc43a0d21a1f8efa351af (22:42): at least one of the specs decided to just have a text field
e29be37c2febc43a0d21a1f8efa351af (22:43): but really, if you want input, you should send input to the lists
e29be37c2febc43a0d21a1f8efa351af (22:43): getting others to proxy for you isn't fair to them :(
f5af272b5b04154c260eec46f4deb905 (22:44): fair enough - wasn't attempting a proxy - I find it's useful to get a second opinion on feedback.
e29be37c2febc43a0d21a1f8efa351af (22:44): i will look at that other spec at some point
e29be37c2febc43a0d21a1f8efa351af (22:44): it's just that today i have a trip to phily
e29be37c2febc43a0d21a1f8efa351af (22:44): so i have to go home and pack
e29be37c2febc43a0d21a1f8efa351af (22:44): it's my first vacation since joining rim
f5af272b5b04154c260eec46f4deb905 (22:45): np at all - was just an opportunitistic ping - no rush whatsoever
e29be37c2febc43a0d21a1f8efa351af (22:45): and it's only 2 days one of which is travel
f5af272b5b04154c260eec46f4deb905 (22:45): yay for you taking vacation!
e29be37c2febc43a0d21a1f8efa351af (22:45): yeah, i'll definitely review that spec at some point, it's on my todo list
e29be37c2febc43a0d21a1f8efa351af (22:45): i might even look at it this month
f5af272b5b04154c260eec46f4deb905 (22:45): have a great time, and please don't worry about the spec at all while you're away.
e29be37c2febc43a0d21a1f8efa351af (22:45): but my spec review list for the month is large
e29be37c2febc43a0d21a1f8efa351af (22:45): right now i'm moderately more worried about some guy who replied to a part 6 in my public-web-intents series
e29be37c2febc43a0d21a1f8efa351af (22:46): afaict he didn't read parts 1..5
f5af272b5b04154c260eec46f4deb905 (22:46): oh you're involved in that nonsense? sorry to hear that.
e29be37c2febc43a0d21a1f8efa351af (22:46): i actually like intents
e29be37c2febc43a0d21a1f8efa351af (22:46): the nonsense is people who jump in w/o reading the setup
e29be37c2febc43a0d21a1f8efa351af (22:46): which i painstakingly wrote
f5af272b5b04154c260eec46f4deb905 (22:46): it's a wrongly framed/named approach, but that's longer discussion we can have after your vacation.
e29be37c2febc43a0d21a1f8efa351af (22:46): i even get people to prereview my posts
e29be37c2febc43a0d21a1f8efa351af (22:47): naming is a disaster i'll give you
e29be37c2febc43a0d21a1f8efa351af (22:47): there are Intents and then there are Intentional Events
e29be37c2febc43a0d21a1f8efa351af (22:47): i'd rather call one "Distributed Actions" and the other "Command Inputs"
f5af272b5b04154c260eec46f4deb905 (22:47): I'm not even going to give you a URL to a blog post I wrote on the subject :)
f5af272b5b04154c260eec46f4deb905 (22:47): go pack and have fun
e29be37c2febc43a0d21a1f8efa351af (22:47): since one can actually keep those two more or less straight
e29be37c2febc43a0d21a1f8efa351af (22:48): please do give it to me on monday
e29be37c2febc43a0d21a1f8efa351af (22:48): i'm really interested in useful critiques
e29be37c2febc43a0d21a1f8efa351af (22:48): and i will try to work them into my writings
f5af272b5b04154c260eec46f4deb905 (22:48): "Distributed Actions" and the other "Command Inputs" are an interesting set of phrases
e29be37c2febc43a0d21a1f8efa351af (22:48): if you haven't read parts 1..6, please do, they're in the archives (part 1 is labeled as a short introduction, the other 5 all have part N in their subject)
e29be37c2febc43a0d21a1f8efa351af (22:49): anyway, i need to finish reading this amusing article and then pick a bus and go home :)
f5af272b5b04154c260eec46f4deb905 (22:49): chat with you monday!

e29be37c2febc43a0d21a1f8efa351af (22:50): i have my tickets (to and from!), my corporate roaming sim (yay!), i didn't order my personal tmobile sim (oops, will get on arrival), and i will get my us amex on arrival, i should check on my ca amex now
e29be37c2febc43a0d21a1f8efa351af (22:50): (todo lists are hard)
